definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
Zhuhai prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China
abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Haizhu district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Cobweb models on times scales are established and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 提出時標下的蛛網模型，討論模型的幾種特殊珠情況。

sentences.english: Colourful pearls obtained under the processing conditions were featured by proper hardness and softness and low shrinkage.
sentences.chinese: 在此工藝條件下製得的彩珠口感適中，收縮率低。

sentences.english: There were no reports of side effects associated with natalizumab therapy.
sentences.chinese: 目前的檢驗報告沒有發現那他珠單抗療法有副作用。

sentences.english: Dry Creek Valley is well known for its sumptuous award-winning Cabernets.
sentences.chinese: 乾溪谷以得獎無數的赤霞珠而聞名。

sentences.english: Look especially for its Cabernet Sauvignon and Sauvignon Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 智利的赤霞珠和長相思白葡萄酒特別好。

sentences.english: San Simeon Cabernet Sauvignon offers bright aromas of raspberry and black cherry.
sentences.chinese: 聖西蒙赤霞珠提供了樹莓和黑櫻桃明亮的香味。

sentences.english: Santa Loreto Syrah Gran Reserva is made from a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon ans Syrah .
sentences.chinese: 花冠特級珍藏赤西拉是由赤霞珠與西拉混合而成。

sentences.english: The reserve cabernet sauvignon has been aged in French and American oak for 17 months.
sentences.chinese: 這款赤霞珠已在法國和美國橡木桶中陳放了17個月。

sentences.english: The ovule browning of Zaocuiwang could be efficiently prevented by removing integument during inoculation.
sentences.chinese: 取出早脆王胚珠，剝去珠被接種可以有效防止褐化。

sentences.english: Sea born pearls or river born pearls?We have both kinds.
sentences.chinese: 您要海水珠還是淡水珠？

sentences.english: Sea born pearls or river born pearls?We have both kinds.
sentences.chinese: 您要海水珠還是淡水珠？

sentences.english: The Dragon Ball Team escapes their prison to search for Pilaf and the Dragon Balls.
sentences.chinese: 尋找龍珠的隊伍逃出了監獄，直奔皮拉夫和龍珠而去。

sentences.english: The company resubmitted the sBLA last month.
sentences.chinese: 該公司重新提交珠上個月。

sentences.english: In short, I do not think I have ever tasted such extraordinary Cabernet Sauvignons.
sentences.chinese: 總之，我從來沒有品嚐到過如此不尋常的赤霞珠。

sentences.english: Sauteed Foie Gras and Chestnut, Tea Foam, Brandy Megranate Ball.
sentences.chinese: 香煎鵝肝配以栗子，菊花泡沫，白蘭地石榴沙司珠。

sentences.english: The kid didn't move anything but his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 小子轉了轉眼珠，還是一動不動。

definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
